sentences.en: a bomb attack
sentences.cn: 炸弹袭击

sentences.en: a knife attack
sentences.cn: 持刀攻击

sentences.en: A muscular spasm in the coronary artery can cause a heart attack.
sentences.cn: 冠状动脉的肌肉痉挛可能导致心脏病。

sentences.en: an arson attack
sentences.cn: 纵火袭击

sentences.en: Army tanks attacked a village near the capital on Sunday.
sentences.cn: 周日，军方的坦克袭击了首都附近的一个村庄。

sentences.en: Bob died of a heart attack, brought on by his lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃死于由他的生活方式引起的心脏病突发。

sentences.en: Frank had been struck down by a massive heart attack.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克的身体已经被一场严重的心脏病拖垮了。

sentences.en: From Cairo came expressions of regret at the attack.
sentences.cn: 开罗对此次攻击表示遗憾。

sentences.en: He died of a heart attack brought on by overwork.
sentences.cn: 他死于劳累过度引起的心脏病发作。

sentences.en: He then launched a scathing attack on previous leaders.
sentences.cn: 他接着严厉地斥责了几位前任领导者。

sentences.en: His article is, predictably, a scathing attack on capitalism.
sentences.cn: 可想而知，他的文章是对资本主义的严厉抨击。

sentences.en: I received a certain amount of sympathy immediately after the attack.
sentences.cn: 遇袭之后，人们立即对我表示了些许同情。

sentences.en: If you smoke then the whole respiratory system is constantly under attack.
sentences.cn: 如果抽烟，整个呼吸系统就会一直受到损害。

sentences.en: Severe shock can bring on an attack of acne.
sentences.cn: 严重的惊吓会造成痤疮突发。

sentences.en: She'll have a heart attack if I tell her.
sentences.cn: 如果我告诉她，她会气坏的。

sentences.en: Successfully merging two banks requires a fast and ruthless attack on costs.
sentences.cn: 成功合并两家银行需要坚决快速地着手解决费用问题。

sentences.en: The enemy must be digging themselves in now ready for the attack.
sentences.cn: 敌人现在一定在挖掩体，准备迎接进攻。

sentences.en: The enemy seemed stunned by the suddenness of the attack.
sentences.cn: 进攻之出其不意似乎让敌人大吃一惊。

sentences.en: The king hight them to attack the castle.
sentences.cn: 国王命令他们向城堡发起进攻。

sentences.en: The magazine recently published a vicious personal attack on the novelist.
sentences.cn: 那本杂志最近发表文章，对这名小说家进行恶意的人身攻击。

sentences.en: the north-western suburbs came under attack in the latest fighting.
sentences.cn: 西北郊在最近的战斗中遭到攻击。

sentences.en: victims of racial attacks
sentences.cn: 种族袭击的受害者

sentences.en: We reopened an attack against our enemy last week.
sentences.cn: 上周我们向敌人重新发动了一次进攻。

sentences.en: Woodlice attack living plants and gnaw at the stems.
sentences.cn: 木虱会侵害活体植物并啃咬它们的茎。

trans.tran_cn: 进攻，冲击，抨击，处理，（疾病）发作，侵袭，进攻队员，损害，伤害
trans.tran_en: an act of violence that is intended to hurt a person or damage a place

trans.tran_cn: 攻击， 袭击； 发作
trans.tran_en: an act of violence that is intended to hurt a person or damage a place
an act of violence that is intended to hurt a person or damage a place

trans.tran_cn: 攻击，抨击，打击，（疾病）发作，侵袭，着手处理
trans.tran_en: to use weapons, such as guns and bombs against an enemy in a war, etc.
an act of violence that is intended to hurt a person or damage a place
to start using guns, bombs etc against an enemy in a war
